text: daivanamattil aruttatil ninn ninnalentinu tinnatirikkanam? ninnalkku nisid'dhamakkiyat eteakkeyenn allahu vivariccutannittuntallea. ninnalava tinnan nirbandhitamakumpealealike. palarum oru vivaravumillate teanniyapeale alukale valipilappiccukeantirikkukayan. sansayamilla; ninre nathan atikramikalepparri nannayariyunnavanan
